price: 50. But when We removed the torment from them, behold, they broke their covenant (that they will believe if We remove the torment from them).
arabic: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: falammā kashafnā ʿanhumu al-ʿadhāba idhā hum yankuthūna
